card.note: I love your laugh & your commitment to your family! You are such a great person and you deserve all the happiness in the world. Happy Birthday Ludo!!!/R
card.author: Devon

card.note: We are always impressed with the clam you convey and just how much of a gentle giant you are. We love being witnesses to the love you have for your family. We are blessed to know you!
card.author: Russell and Whitney Jones

card.note: Why narrow it to one? He has a great laugh, he's a great all around guy, he's a great dad, he can drink, and he can teach our kid how to curse in French!!
card.author: Mike and Kristen McKee

card.note: You are very good at making everyone around you happy. I'm so thankful that my Sally found you!
card.author: Connolly

card.note: I love how much Ludo loves Christmas! His dedication to present buying and present assembly and present photography is UNMATCHED! :)
card.author: Samantha McIntyre

card.note: I can't possibly pick ONE thing I like about you! I am SO lucky to get to love you, see you, talk to you, and be a parent with you!/RI am inspired by you everyday. Here's to 40 more years together!!! I love you forever. Happy 40th Birthday!!! Wohoo!
card.author: Sally

card.note: "I am happy when I am hugging Daddy."
card.author: Porter

card.note: The smile I have when you walk in the room says it all.
card.author: Maelle

card.note: Sorry I barf in the middle of the night and make you clean it up. Happy Birthday though.
card.author: Bato (your cat)

card.note: I will always remember the epic Catch Phrase battles! We had so much fun with our families! Love you lots! Hope you have an amazing 40th birthday!
card.author: Jennifer Magill

card.note: How you treat my friend Sally like she is a Queen and you are such a great Daddy to your babies. Also you are always in the know about super heroes!
card.author: Jennifer Lyles

card.note: What I like most about you is how protective you are. No matter the situation, you always put my safety first. I know you kept me out of trouble more often than I'm willing to admit. You make me feel loved and were always the one I came home to when we were kids.
card.author: Ton éternellement petite soeur

card.note: I love most about Ludo that he is a great husband, super baby Daddy, and wonderful son in law. He takes care of things at our house we can no longer do and he is THE BOMB with all the current technology! We are blessed and couldn't love him more if he was our own son.
card.author: Cindy McIntyre

card.note: One think I like most about Ludo is his big teddy bear heart!
card.author: Jenn Magill

card.note: One thing I like about Ludo is the way he can be intimidating and hug-able at the same time!
card.author: Lyn Caudle

card.note: "Mommy was that Santa or Ludo?" I had to swallow my laughter as I very seriously told him it was indeed Santa. He only made his voice sound like Ludo so you wouldn't be scared. Spencer smiled and went back to sleep. Thanks Ludo~ you are always French Santa to us.
card.author: Kristy Gaconnier

card.note: My favorite thing about Ludo is how generous he is with his talents. He's always there to fix any problem, and keeping our parents' computers and electronics up and running is a gift and a miracle.
card.author: Wade McIntyre

card.note: Ludo and Sally have been such wonderful neighbors since you moved in. We could not have asked for better neighbors and friends. Thank you for being there anytime we needed you. Have a wonderful birthday and many more to come. Love always.
card.author: Mike, Pam, and Marlee

card.note: Simply put, your enthusiasm for life!
card.author: Will Oliver

card.note: Ludo is generous, honest, fun and outgoing!
card.author: Steve Quentin

card.note: Ludo, you are a huge part of making everyday at work a blast. Thank you for your experience and passion for excellence. I can’t wait to see where we take the Lab!
card.author: Brandon Charmichael

card.note: I sincerely appreciate everything you do Ludo,and feel lucky to work with such a talented boss!
card.author: Bekah Shamsa

card.note: I like Ludo's laugh. Ludo can laugh even when there is no reason to do so... he's that positive. He's a guy that sees a glass with water in it and isn't concerned with whether it is half empty or half full. He's just grateful to have a glass with something in it.
card.author: Lara Bullock

card.note: One thing I like about Ludo is his passion and enthusiasm towards teaching. I also like his whirlyball skills.
card.author: Brian

card.note: The biggest thing I like about Ludo is his personality and his humor.
card.author: James Homrighausen

card.note: It is such an honor to get to work with you each and every day. I really appreciate all your passion, thoughtfulness, and friendship./RI am really looking forward to what we can accomplish together!!!!!!/RIt was great to have you with us on our trip to Vegas. Had a blas
card.author: Your Friend, John Higgs

card.note: Ludo always knows what is going on with his kids. He's the most involved dad I have ever met even while working too!
card.author: Mary Holland

card.note: Ludo is very driven with great enthusiasm for his work. Also he has an excellent artistic eye with a particular gift of adding the tiny little details which takes our work to the next level./R
card.author: Jason Anderson

card.note: Ludo is crazy talented! He has a great artistic eye, but he is also a technical genius. Such strong left brain and right brain talent is rare and a guy like Ludo is truly one of a kind!
card.author: Julie Barrett
